title: Number of U.S. Pinterest users 2017 , by gender
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Number of users in millions in each Sex on the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The minimum Sex Male has got 1.81 times less Number of users in millions than the maximum Sex Female.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Sex in the x axis and Number of users in millions in the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Sex, and Number of users in millions in each Sex on the y axis.
The Number of users in millions is highest at Sex Female and lowest at Sex Male.
The minimum Sex Male has got 1.81 times less Number of users in millions than the maximum Sex Female.
max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of users in millions for 2 number of Sexs.
Sex Female has the highest Number of users in millions and Male has the lowest Number of users in millions.
Sex Male has 1.81 times less Number of users in millions than Sex Female which is the highest.
The Sex Female has 1.29 times more Number of users in millions than average.
The Number of users in millions is 91.5 if we add up values of all Sexs.
